mapper.select: SELECT SUM(REPLACE(importAmount,',','')) importAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(exportAmount,',','')) exportAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(manageCost,',','')) manageRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(balancebak,',','')) projectTotalBalance, SUM(REPLACE(companyFunds,',','')) companyFundsStat, SUM(REPLACE(warrantyAmount,',','')) warrantyRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(backWarrantyAmount,',','')) backWarrantyAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(supplementaryBusinessTax,',','')) supplementaryBusinessTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(stampDuty,',','')) stampDutyRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(otherAmount,',','')) otherTaxRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(interest,',','')) interestStat, SUM(REPLACE(localBankDeposit,',','')) localBankDepositStat, SUM(REPLACE(individualIncomeTax,',','')) individualIncomeTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(corporateIncomeTax,',','')) corporateIncomeTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(vatSalesTax,',','')) vatSalesTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(educationSurcharge,',','')) educationSurchargeStat, SUM(REPLACE(localEducationAttached,',','')) localEducationAttachedStat, SUM(REPLACE(vatIncomeTax,',','')) vatIncomeTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(materialGeld,',','')) materialGeldStat, SUM(REPLACE(cityBuildTax,',','')) cityBuildTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(labourServiceFee,',','')) labourServiceFeeStat FROM projectToll GROUP BY projectId HAVING projectId = #{projectId}
SELECT SUM(REPLACE(pt.balance,',','')) pmTotalAmount FROM projectToll pt WHERE pt.projectId IN (SELECT p.projectId FROM projectInfo p WHERE p.pmId = #{pmId})
SELECT SUM(REPLACE(invoiceAmount,',','')) invoiceAmountStat,SUM(REPLACE(tax,',','')) taxStat FROM invoice GROUP BY projectId HAVING projectId = #{projectId}
SELECT SUM(REPLACE(receiptAmount,',','')) receiptAmountStat FROM receipt GROUP BY projectId HAVING projectId = #{projectId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(REPLACE(importAmount,',','')) importAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(exportAmount,',','')) exportAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(manageCost,',','')) manageRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(balance,',','')) projectTotalBalance, SUM(REPLACE(corporateIncomeTax,',','')) companyFundsStat, SUM(REPLACE(warrantyAmount,',','')) warrantyRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(backWarrantyAmount,',','')) backWarrantyAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(supplementaryBusinessTax,',','')) supplementaryBusinessTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(stampDuty,',','')) stampDutyRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(otherAmount,',','')) otherTaxRateStat, SUM(REPLACE(interest,',','')) interestStat, SUM(REPLACE(localBankDeposit,',','')) localBankDepositStat, SUM(REPLACE(individualIncomeTax,',','')) individualIncomeTaxStat, SUM(REPLACE(corporateIncomeTax,',','')) corporateIncomeTaxStat FROM projectToll GROUP BY projectId,importAmount,exportAmount,manageCost,balance,corporateIncomeTax,warrantyAmount,backWarrantyAmount, supplementaryBusinessTax,stampDuty,otherAmount,interest,localBankDeposit,individualIncomeTax,corporateIncomeTax HAVING projectId = #{projectId} ) a , ( SELECT SUM(REPLACE(pt.balance,',','')) pmTotalAmount FROM projectToll pt WHERE pt.projectId IN (SELECT p.projectId FROM projectInfo p WHERE p.pmId = #{pmId} ) b , ( SELECT SUM(REPLACE(invoiceAmount,',','')) invoiceAmountStat FROM invoice GROUP BY projectId,invoiceAmount HAVING projectId = #{projectId} ) c , ( SELECT SUM(REPLACE(receiptAmount,',','')) receiptAmountStat FROM receipt GROUP BY projectId,receiptAmount HAVING projectId = #{projectId} ) d
select SUM(REPLACE(invoiceAmount,',','')) invoiceAmountStat, SUM(REPLACE(tax,',','')) taxStat, SUM(REPLACE(taxTotal,',','')) taxTotalStat from invoice where projectId = #{projectId}

select projectId,tollageType, SUM(REPLACE(addedValueTaxValue,',','')) addedValueTaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(corporateIncomeTaxValue,',','')) corporateIncomeTaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(individualIncomeTaxValue,',','')) individualIncomeTaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(stampDutyValue,',','')) stampDutyValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(constructionTaxValue,',','')) constructionTaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(educationalSurtaxValue,',','')) educationalSurtaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(areaEducationalSurtaxValue,',',''))areaEducationalSurtaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(waterBuildTaxValue,',','')) waterBuildTaxValueStat, SUM(REPLACE(otherTaxValue,',','')) otherTaxValueStat from invoicetaxbill where projectId = #{projectId} GROUP BY tollageType

select taxRates, sum(REPLACE(amount,',','')) amountStat, sum(REPLACE(taxAmount,',','')) taxAmountStat, sum(REPLACE(taxPriceAmount,',','')) taxPriceAmountStat from labourserviceinvoice where projectId = #{projectId} GROUP BY taxRates ORDER BY CONVERT(taxRates,SIGNED) asc

select taxRate taxRates, sum(REPLACE(amount,',','')) amountStat, sum(REPLACE(taxAmount,',','')) taxAmountStat, sum(REPLACE(taxPrice,',','')) taxPriceAmountStat from materialinvoice where projectId = #{projectId} GROUP BY taxRate ORDER BY CONVERT(taxRates,SIGNED) asc
